title: India’s Plan to Hike Tax on Equity Derivatives Jolts Market
description: Indian equities slumped after the government said it plans to raise taxes on equity derivatives trades, doubling down on efforts to curb speculative activity among retail investors.
content: Indian equities slumped after the government said it plans to raise taxes on equity derivatives trades, doubling down on efforts to curb speculative activity among retail investors.
